channel.title: Page on open collector
channel.description: Recent content in Page on open collector

item.title: About
item.description: Dave (also: davidk) is the person behind open collector. I build cloud tooling software as a day job, mostly tailored to all things Linux. Open Collector is mostly where I document long-form projects and/or things that don’t belong on other sites (thingiverse, forums, short tweets). Popular Posts This is some of the stuff that has been oddly popular over time. I can’t promise they’re up to date as things move faster than I often expect.
